Text: The Colosseum at Caesars Palace:  The theatre is the main entertainment venue for Caesars Palace.

Text: The Colosseum at Caesars Palace:  Deemed the "Home of the Greatest Entertainers in the World", the theatre hosts numerous residency shows by Celine Dion, Elton John, Rod Stewart, Cher, Bette Midler, Shania Twain, and Mariah Carey.

<Text: The Colosseum at Caesars Palace:  The venue has an estimated seating capacity of 4,296 and is inspired by the architecture of ancient Rome along with aspects of contemporary architecture.>

Text: The Colosseum at Caesars Palace:  The cost of the theatre totaled $108 million, becoming the most expensive entertainment venue in Las Vegas, beating the "O" Theatre at the Bellagio Las Vegas.
